title: Remove all photo upload/add-photo UI from the Valentine flow

requirements.text: Remove all user-facing UI that allows adding/uploading photos from the app, including any "Add photo" / "Add your own picture" slots and any related call-to-action text.

quotes: then remove all the places where were to add photos

acceptanceCriteria: No page in the app shows a photo upload control, file picker trigger, or "add/upload photo" call-to-action text.
Users cannot click/tap anywhere in the UI to open a file chooser for images.

requirements.text: Update PostYesMovieDatePage to remove the PhotoSlot section and adjust the layout so the page remains visually balanced without a photo area (e.g., movie details can span full width or use an alternative non-upload visual element that is not user-editable).

quotes: then remove all the places where were to add photos

acceptanceCriteria: The movie date page renders without empty/unused space where the photo slot previously appeared.
No user-facing text remains that instructs the user to add or upload a picture.

requirements.text: Update ValentineAskPage to remove the readonly PhotoSlot grid shown in the post-acceptance celebration state.

quotes: then remove all the places where were to add photos

acceptanceCriteria: The post-acceptance celebration view renders cleanly without the 3-slot photo grid.
All other existing interactions (Yes/No flow, celebration overlay, navigation to the movie date page) continue to work as before.

requirements.text: Remove or retire the PhotoSlot component so it is not used anywhere in the frontend build (delete the file if unused, or leave it but ensure there are no imports/usages).

quotes: then remove all the places where were to add photos

acceptanceCriteria: There are zero remaining imports/usages of `PhotoSlot` in the frontend codebase.
The frontend builds successfully with no lint/type errors related to removed photo functionality.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify files listed as immutable by the platform (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Keep the backend as-is (no photo persistence feature should be added).
nonGoals: Do not implement photo storage or any backend image upload/persistence.
Do not add new authentication, database-like storage, or external services for images.
